review: Really a motivational and positive movie. But it's sad that such good films don't get much publicity and the bakwaas khans type movies get all the attention. Media should highlight such movies. Music is excellent. Rajeev is outstanding.

I'd really congratulate the team behind this movie for bringing ha such a lovely different story. ! This movie is must watch for true movie lovers. You are best folks!
With Love from Atul
